featured.text: Each year, over a quarter of a million students take courses this way.

definition.zh_def: 四分之一；一季；季度；25美分硬幣。
definition.en_def: One-fourth of something; a period of three months in a year; a coin worth 25 cents.
definition.example: She saved a quarter of her salary for a vacation.
